name: Swarmsim
body:
### Welcome to Simple Swarm Simulator (SSS)  
Written in python with pygame  

### Keys and Features  
Array Up - Faster  
Arrow Down - Slower  
Arrow Right - Next Mode  
Arrow Left - Previous mode  
Key P   -   Show/Hide Path  
ESC     -      quit  
  
### Do Not Press the B Key while running, Very Dangerous.  
  
  
### Installation and run  
python 3.4  
pygame 2.8  
run with  
  open terminal to swarmsim/componets/  
  python ./main.py  
  
  
### Support or Contact  
Made for education use.  no support.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
